name: Top Climb
description:
A split-screen player vs player platform racer

Start by placing traps on your friends side of the map, then race them towards the finish line by climbing the platforms as fast as possible. Avoid the traps on your path and climb the platforms to the finish line.

At the start of the game you and your friend with take turns placing traps on the opposing side. Each trap cost a certain amount to place and you each have a balance to buy the traps of your strategy.

After you and you friend both run out of balance to place traps, the racing starts! Platform you way up to the finish line first to win.

While climbing, if you die to a trap you will be respawned shortly after and most traps will be destroyed.  First to reach the top wins.
